content: TE DRS-B Dust removal system Dust removal system for concrete chiseling with Hilti SDS Max (TE-Y) and TE-S breakers ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Dust extraction attachments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Solution for virtually dust-free breaking with Hilti SDS Max (TE-Y) and TE-S breakers Applications Practically all indoor chiseling and renovation work Virtually dustless chiseling in critical environments â€“ for the health and comfort of the user and for clean surroundings, e.g. occupied rooms, hospitals, laboratories, production lines, etc. For use with the following breakers: TE 500, TE 500-AVR, TE 700-AVR, TE 800, TE 800-AVR, TE 1000-AVR, TE 1500-AVR, TE 2000-AVR ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: TE 1000-AVR, TE 1500-AVR, TE 2000-AVR, TE 500-AVR, TE 700-AVR, TE 800, TE 800-AVR Need vacuum cleaner: Yes Suitable for drilling: No Technical Data | For use with | TE 1000-AVR, TE 1500-AVR, TE 2000-AVR, TE 500-AVR, TE 700-AVR, TE 800, TE 800-AVR | Need vacuum cleaner | Yes | Suitable for drilling | No | Weight | 1.72 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 13.4 x 3.9 x 6 in ### ITEMS- 365944 - Dust removal system TE-DRS-B - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE DRS-B Dust removal system assy - 1x TE DRS-B Tool case assy - 273321 - TE DRS-B Base module - Package Size 1 pc - 273325 - TE DRS-B Adapter Y - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Y TE DRS-B Adapter - 273324 - TE DRS-B Adapter S1 - Package Size 1 pc
